summary: Website for DESVA (handmade bouquets, polaroids, bookmarks, customized gifts) with a premium/minimal soft-feminine design, product collection pages with pricing, and a custom orders form.
architectural_notes: Site pages: Home, Bouquet Collection, Polaroid Collection, Bookmark Collection, Customized Card Collection, Custom Orders.
Brand/style direction: premium, minimal, soft feminine, luxury-but-affordable; clean spacing, elegant typography, smooth animations; Instagram-friendly product grid; mobile-first.
Use uploaded logo image in Home hero alongside brand name 'DESVA' and tagline 'personalized With Love'.
Footer includes Instagram link, contact email, and 'Made with Love by DESVA'.
Custom Orders includes form plus CTA text: 'DM us on Instagram for quick custom orders.'
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Favicon icon derived from the uploaded logo style (desva-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
- App icon derived from the uploaded logo style (desva-appicon.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Create a site-wide layout with a top navigation and a simple footer, and add routes for: Home, Bouquet Collection, Polaroid Collection, Bookmark Collection, Customized Card Collection, and Custom Orders.

Implement the Home page sections: (1) Hero with large brand name “DESVA”, the uploaded logo image, tagline “personalized With Love”, soft pastel pink background, and two CTAs “Shop Now” and “Explore Collections”; (2) Short Intro section with the provided DESVA description; (3) Featured Categories preview cards for Bouquets, Polaroids, Bookmarks, Customized Cards; (4) “Why Choose DESVA” section with the 4 bullet points; include smooth scrolling for in-page sections where applicable.

Create the Bouquet Collection page showing 4 bouquet types with the exact pricing tiers provided, and include the note: “Customized pricing may vary based on design complexity.” Also include the Pipe Cleaner Flower Bouquet pricing split into: Normal – ₹200, Medium / Premium – ₹250, Customized Premium – Starting ₹300+.
Create the Polaroid Collection page with the three sizes and prices: Square – ₹9, Rectangle – ₹9, Large – ₹11, and display the provided short description.
Create the Bookmark Collection page showing Starting Price – ₹49 and the provided description.
Create the Customized Card Collection page showing Price – ₹250 and the provided description.

Create the Custom Orders page with a form containing these fields: Name, Product Type, Event Type, Quantity, Custom Message, Date Required; include the line “DM us on Instagram for quick custom orders.”

Apply the requested site-wide design style: soft pastel palette (blush pink, beige, cream, light blue), white clean backgrounds, rounded buttons, minimal icons, elegant typography, Instagram-style product grids, mobile-friendly layout, and smooth transitions/animations; ensure the overall look is premium, minimal, soft feminine, not cluttered, and luxury-but-affordable.
Integrate the uploaded logo image (IMG_5343.jpeg) as a static frontend asset and use it in the Home hero and (optionally) in the navigation bar brand area.
Create a coherent visual theme system (colors, type scale, spacing, radii) aligned to the provided pastel/luxury-boutique direction and enforce it consistently across all pages and components.
Add generated icon assets (favicon + app icons) that visually match the uploaded logo style, and serve them as static assets from the frontend.
